{"id":565551745,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1633338791,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"220 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/565551745/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"96.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n    int tot=0;\n        int rep=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<grid.size();i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=0;j<grid[0].size();j++)\n            {\n                if(grid[i][j]==1)\n                {\n                    tot++;                \n                if(i!=0&&grid[i-1][j]==1)\n                    rep++;\n                 if(j!=0&&grid[i][j-1]==1)\n                    rep++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n       // cout<<tot<<\" \"<<rep;\n        return ((4*tot)-(2*rep));\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
